title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes are immediately applied without confirmation.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. The package view is filtered.
EB: When the working set is removed, there should be a confirmation dialog asking for confirmation before applying the changes.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Right-click on the working set and select 'Remove'. 3. Verify that a confirmation dialog appears asking for confirmation before applying the changes.
